scripts.develop: PRJROOT=${PWD}/__test__/project angel repo cells -- npm run develop
scripts.build: angel repo cells -- npm run build
scripts.postinstall: cd ./cells/server && npm install && cd ../node_modules/lib && npm install
scripts.pack: npm run build && git add --all ./ && git commit -m 'release build'
scripts.re-install-modules: rm -rf package-lock.json && rm -rf ./node_modules && npm i && rm -rf ./cells/node_modules/lib/node_modules && rm -f ./cells/node_modules/lib/package-lock.json && angel repo cells -- rm -f package-lock.json && rm -rf ./node_modules && npm i && cd ./cells/node_modules/lib && npm i
scripts.release-patch: npm run pack && npm version patch && git push --tags && git push origin master
scripts.release-minor: npm run pack && npm version minor && git push --tags && git push origin master
scripts.release-major: npm run pack && npm version major && git push --tags && git push origin master
